snippet: Gut finished fourth in a giant slalom in Jasna, Slovakia, to move to 22 points ahead of the injured Lindsey Vonn and 263 ahead of Viktoria Rebensburg of Germany.
abstract: Lara Gut of Switzerland finishes forth in giant slalom in Jasna, Slovakia, to replace American Lindsey Vonn on top of overall women's World Cup standings.
lead_paragraph: Gut finished fourth in a giant slalom in Jasna, Slovakia, to move to 22 points ahead of the injured Lindsey Vonn and 263 ahead of Viktoria Rebensburg of Germany.

headline.main: Lara Gut Nears World Cup Overall Title
